CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 27 reads: " Dazzling Displays Exhibit Top PRoducts at Fair...6. Robert M. Hayes of Atlantic City, wooed the women visitors with his various beauty aid products by Apex...Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: Women gathered around Robert M. Hayes in Apex Beauty Products booth in Syria Mosque for the 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
